summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3684 , for the improvement of West 72nd Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45391 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
